desc: Based in Jacksonville, Florida, COOPERfect Creations offers a variety of items from custom vinyl t-shirts, masks, wall decor, bracelets, chakra sets and crystals. Let us know what we can create for you!

layout.text: We’re dedicated to bringing you exciting new tumbled gemstones, crystals, clusters, rough and raw stones, towers, spheres, and more! Browse our new arrivals to find your favorite crystals and stones.
